location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

physicalDescription.extent: Materials: Printed on paperDimensions: 484 x 632mm, on sheet 552 x 632 mm

mods.abstract: The map shows Transjordan [Jordan], and all or parts of neighbouring countries including Palestine, Syria, Iraq, and Egypt. International frontiers, and railways, roads and tracks in Transjordan are indicated.The map was created by the Research Department of the Foreign Office, and it and it is part of a paper on Greater Transjordan (M.E.(O) W.P. 6) prepared by the Working Party of the Middle East (Official) Committee [folios 241 to 260 of IOR/L/PS/12/4756].
